decision_conditions: Remove 2 x Portuguese laurel that, once Laurels removed reduce height of 5 x Lawsons Cypress by 3-4m cut back from garage roof x shape.

The following works requested  are not covered by the TPO 16/73 and 41 main Road is not in a Conservation Area, but this is taken as a notification that supplementary tree works are to be carried out at this address, to remove two Portuguese laurels and reduce the height of five Lawsons Cypress by 3-4m, cutting back from garage roof and balance.
It is recommended that works can be completed to the trees T2 Lime and T4 Monterey cypress as identified on the Havering TPO plan 16/73;
T2 Lime (tilia) cut back overhang to property, feather up to 6m crown break plus 1m above, and crown reduce by up to 2m.
T4 Monterey cypress (Cupressus macrocarpa) 10% crown thin, cut back overhang towards the property, 1 Lake Rise and crown reduce  by up to 1.5m.
The work for which consent is granted shall be carried out to the standards detailed in British Standard Document BS 3998:2010.
To ensure that the work is carried out in accordance with good arboricultural practice.
The work for which consent is granted shall be carried out as an overall reduction, so that the tree's crown remains balanced.
To ensure that the tree's stability is maintained and in the interests of public amenity.
The work for which consent is granted shall be carried out within 2 years from the date of this consent.
To prevent the accumulation of consents.

It is suggested that you engage the services of a qualified and fully insured tree surgeon to carry out the above work on your behalf (you should ask to see the contractor's insurance certificate and make sure that it is up to date).
description:
(T2) Lime (tilia) cut back overhang to property, feather up to 6m crown break plus 1m x crown reduction 2m up. 
(T4) Monterey cypress (Cupresses macrocarpa) 10% crown thin overhang. Crown reduction by 1.5m. 
Remove 2 x Portuguese laurel that, once Laurels removed reduce height of 5 x Lawsons Cypress by 3-4m cut back from garage roof x shape.
